summary.span: 表示可以添加到 的实例的程序集绑定信息。

span.span: Represents assembly binding information that can be added to an instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改 实例的属性不会影响任何现有 。Changing the properties of an instance does not affect any existing . 当使用 实例作为参数调用 方法时，它只会影响创建新 。It can affect only the creation of a new , when the method is called with the instance as a parameter. 此类实现 接口。This class implements the interface. > [!CAUTION] > 属性的默认值为 false。The default value for the property is false. 对于服务，此设置是不安全的。This setting is unsafe for services. 若要帮助防止服务下载部分受信任的代码，请将此属性设置为 trueTo help prevent services from downloading partially trusted code, set this property to true

member this.AppDomainInitializer : AppDomainInitializer with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 委托，该委托表示在初始化应用程序域时调用的回调方法。

span.span: Gets or sets the delegate, which represents a callback method that is invoked when the application domain is initialized.

value.span: 一个委托，表示在初始化应用程序域时调用的回调方法。

span.span: A delegate that represents a callback method that is invoked when the application domain is initialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要将信息传递给回调方法，请将字符串数组分配给 属性。To pass information to the callback method, assign an array of strings to the property. 每次初始化 时，都会将数组传递给回调方法。The array is passed to the callback method each time an is initialized. 回调方法在新创建的应用程序域的上下文中执行。The callback method is executed in the context of the newly created application domain. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 对象和默认应用程序域中的证据创建名为 `ChildDomain`的子应用程序域。The following example creates a child application domain named `ChildDomain`, using an object and evidence from the default application domain. 属性设置为回调方法 `AppDomainInit`，该方法是在初始化子域时调用的。The property is set to the callback method `AppDomainInit`, which is invoked when the child domain is initialized. 回调方法的参数放置在一个字符串数组中，该数组分配给 属性。The arguments for the callback method are placed in an array of strings, which is assigned to the property. 创建子域时，回调方法只是打印字符串。When the child domain is created, the callback method simply prints the strings. [!code-cpp[AppDomainInitializer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainInitializer/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomainInitializer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainInitializer/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomainInitializer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainInitializer/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置传给 委托所表示的回调方法的参数。

span.span: Gets or sets the arguments passed to the callback method represented by the delegate.

summary.span: 在初始化应用程序域时将调用该回调方法。

span.span: The callback method is invoked when the application domain is initialized.

value.span: 一个字符串数组，当在 初始化过程中调用 委托所表示的回调方法时，该字符串数组将被传给该回调方法。

span.span: An array of strings that is passed to the callback method represented by the delegate, when the callback method is invoked during initialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定在 初始化过程中调用的回调方法。Use the property to specify a callback method that is invoked during initialization. 如果未设置 属性，则不使用分配给此属性的数组。If the property is not set, the array assigned to this property is not used. 回调方法在新创建的应用程序域的上下文中执行。The callback method is executed in the context of the newly created application domain. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 对象和默认应用程序域中的证据创建名为 `ChildDomain`的子应用程序域。The following code example creates a child application domain named `ChildDomain`, using an object and evidence from the default application domain. 属性设置为回调方法 `AppDomainInit`，该方法是在初始化子域时调用的。The property is set to the callback method `AppDomainInit`, which is invoked when the child domain is initialized. 回调方法的参数放置在一个字符串数组中，该数组分配给 属性。The arguments for the callback method are placed in an array of strings, which is assigned to the property. 创建子域时，回调方法只是打印字符串。When the child domain is created, the callback method simply prints the strings. [!code-cpp[AppDomainInitializer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainInitializer/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomainInitializer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainInitializer/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomainInitializer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainInitializer/VB/source.vb#1)]

member this.AppDomainManagerAssembly : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置程序集的显示名称，该程序集为使用 对象创建的应用程序域提供应用程序域管理器的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the display name of the assembly that provides the type of the application domain manager for application domains created using this object.

value.span: 程序集的显示名称，该程序集提供应用程序域管理器的 。

span.span: The display name of the assembly that provides the of the application domain manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定应用程序域管理器的类型，请将此属性和 属性都设置为。To specify the type of the application domain manager, set both this property and the property. 如果未设置这些属性中的任何一个，则将忽略另一个属性。If either of these properties is not set, the other is ignored. 如果未提供任何类型，则将从与父应用程序域相同的类型（即，从中调用 方法的应用程序域）创建应用程序域管理器。If no type is provided, the application domain manager is created from the same type as the parent application domain (that is, the application domain from which the method is called). 加载应用程序域时，如果程序集不存在，或者程序集不包含由 属性指定的类型，则会引发 。When the application domain is loaded, is thrown if the assembly does not exist, or if the assembly does not contain the type specified by the property. 如果找到程序集但版本信息不匹配，则会引发 。 is thrown if the assembly is found but the version information does not match. 若要设置默认应用程序域的应用程序域管理器，请在应用程序配置文件的 " [\<运行时 >](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md) " 部分中使用[\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md)和[\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element.md)元素，或使用 中所述的环境变量。To set the application domain manager for the default application domain, use the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md) and [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element.md) elements in the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md) section of the application configuration file, or use the environment variables described in . 此功能要求应用程序具有完全信任。This feature requires the application to have full trust. （例如，在桌面上运行的应用程序具有完全信任。）如果应用程序不具有完全信任，则会引发 。(For example, an application running on the desktop has full trust.) If the application does not have full trust, a is thrown. 程序集显示名称的格式由 属性指定。The format of the assembly display name is given by the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置类型的全名，该类型可为使用此 对象创建的应用程序域提供应用程序域管理器。

span.span: Gets or sets the full name of the type that provides the application domain manager for application domains created using this object.

value.span: 类型的全名，其中包括命名空间。

span.span: The full name of the type, including the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定应用程序域管理器的类型，请将此属性和 属性都设置为。To specify the type of the application domain manager, set both this property and the property. 如果未设置这些属性中的任何一个，则将忽略另一个属性。If either of these properties is not set, the other is ignored. 如果未提供任何类型，则将从与父应用程序域相同的类型（即，从中调用 方法的应用程序域）创建应用程序域管理器。If no type is provided, the application domain manager is created from the same type as the parent application domain (that is, the application domain from which the method is called). 加载应用程序域时，如果由 属性指定的程序集不包含此属性指定的类型，则会引发 。When the application domain is loaded, is thrown if the assembly specified by the property does not contain the type specified by this property. 若要设置默认应用程序域的应用程序域管理器，请在应用程序配置文件的 " [\<运行时 >](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md) " 部分中使用[\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md)和[\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element.md)元素，或使用 中所述的环境变量。To set the application domain manager for the default application domain, use the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md) and [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element.md) elements in the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md) section of the application configuration file, or use the environment variables described in . 此功能要求应用程序具有完全信任。This feature requires the application to have full trust. （例如，在桌面上运行的应用程序具有完全信任。）如果应用程序不具有完全信任，则会引发 。(For example, an application running on the desktop has full trust.) If the application does not have full trust, a is thrown. 类型的完整名称的格式由 属性指定。The format of the full name of a type is given by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationBase As String
public: property System::String ^ ApplicationBase { System::String ^ get(); };
public: property System::String ^ ApplicationBase { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ApplicationBase : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置包含该应用程序的目录的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the directory containing the application.

value.span: 应用程序基目录的名称。

span.span: The name of the application base directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序基目录是程序集管理器开始探测程序集的位置。The application base directory is where the assembly manager begins probing for assemblies. 属性可能会影响为应用程序域授予的权限。The property can influence which permissions are granted to an application domain. 例如，来自本地计算机的应用程序域通常基于其源位置获得完全信任。For example, an application domain originating from the local computer normally receives full trust based on its location of origin. 但是，如果该 的 属性设置为 intranet 目录的全名，则 设置会将授予应用程序域的权限限制为 LocalIntranet grant，即使应用程序域实际上来自本地计算机也是如此。However, if the property of that is set to the full name of an intranet directory, the setting restricts the permissions granted to the application domain to a LocalIntranet grant even though the application domain actually originates from the local computer. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性设置程序集加载程序开始探测程序集以加载到新应用程序域中的位置。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to set the location where the assembly loader begins probing for assemblies to load into a new application domain. > [!NOTE] > 必须确保指定的文件夹存在。You must ensure that the folder you specify exists. [!code-cpp[ADApplicationBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADApplicationBase/CPP/adapplicationbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADApplicationBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADApplicationBase/CS/adapplicationbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADApplicationBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADApplicationBase/VB/adapplicationbase.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ApplicationName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ApplicationName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application.

value.span: 应用程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the application.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在创建新的应用程序域时设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property when you create a new application domain. 该示例创建一个新的应用程序域，然后调用 方法，将示例程序集加载到新应用程序域中，并创建 `Worker` 类的实例。The example creates a new application domain, and then calls the method to load the example assembly into the new application domain and create an instance of the `Worker` class. `Worker` 类继承 ，因此该示例可以使用 返回的代理来调用 `TestLoad` 方法。The `Worker` class inherits , so the example can use the proxy returned by to call the `TestLoad` method. `TestLoad` 方法加载指定的程序集。The `TestLoad` method loads an assembly that you specify. 您必须指定有效的完全限定的程序集名称或注释掉 方法。You must either specify a valid, fully qualified assembly name, or comment out the method. `TestLoad` 方法列出加载到新应用程序域中的程序集，并显示指定的程序集和示例程序集已加载。The `TestLoad` method lists the assemblies that are loaded into the new application domain, showing that your specified assembly and the example assembly are loaded. 该示例使用 特性告诉程序集加载程序，应用程序将如何跨应用程序域共享代码。The example uses the attribute to tell the assembly loader how the application will share code across application domains. [!code-cpp[ADMultiDomain#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADMultiDomain/CPP/admultidomain.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADMultiDomain#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADMultiDomain/CS/admultidomain.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADMultiDomain#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADMultiDomain/VB/admultidomain.vb#1)]

The property is set to .

summary.span: 获取或设置特定于应用程序且从中对文件进行卷影复制的区域的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of an area specific to the application where files are shadow copied.

value.span: 从中对文件进行卷影复制的目录路径和文件名的完全限定名。

span.span: The fully qualified name of the directory path and file name where files are shadow copied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了使此属性生效，还必须设置 "" 属性。In order for this property to have an effect, the property must also be set. 如果未设置 属性，则将忽略 属性，并将卷影副本缓存位置默认为下载缓存。If the property is not set, the property is ignored and the shadow copy cache location defaults to the download cache. 有关卷影复制的详细信息，请参阅[卷影复制程序集](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。For more information on shadow copying, see [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md).

span.span: Shadow Copying Assemblies

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ConfigurationFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ConfigurationFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序域的配置文件的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the configuration file for an application domain.

value.span: 配置文件的名称。

span.span: The name of the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置文件描述应用程序域的搜索规则和配置数据。The configuration file describes the search rules and configuration data for the application domain. 创建应用程序域的主机负责提供此数据，因为有意义的值因情况而异。The host that creates the application domain is responsible for supplying this data because the meaningful values vary from situation to situation. 例如，为每个应用程序、站点和计算机存储 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置数据，而针对每个应用程序、用户和计算机存储可执行文件的配置数据。For example, the configuration data for ASP.NET applications is stored for each application, site, and computer, while the configuration data for an executable is stored for each application, user, and computer. 只有主机知道特定情况下的配置数据细节。Only the host knows the specifics of the configuration data for a particular circumstance.

span.span: Runtime Settings Schema

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisallowApplicationBaseProbing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.DisallowApplicationBaseProbing : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指定在搜索要加载的程序集时是否探测应用程序基路径和专用二进制路径。

span.span: Specifies whether the application base path and private binary path are probed when searching for assemblies to load.

value.span: 如果不允许探测，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if probing is not allowed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `true` 属性，则忽略 属性的值。If the property is `true`, the value of the property is ignored. 也就是说，不会在 属性指定的目录中探测程序集。That is, no assemblies are probed for in the directories specified by the property. 此外，将忽略 属性和 属性的值。In addition, the values of the property and the property are ignored. 不会在由 属性指定的目录中探测到的程序集。No assemblies are probed for in the directories specified by the property. 属性提供了对加载过程的额外控制层。The property provides an additional layer of control over the loading process. 在常规程序集加载序列中，将在引发 事件之前探测应用程序基。In the normal assembly loading sequence, the application base is probed before the event is raised. 但是，某些应用程序可能需要从文档内的 OLE 复合文件，或从非全局程序集缓存中的唯一已知位置或 和 属性所指定的目录中加载程序集。However, some applications might need to load assemblies from an OLE compound file within a document, or from a unique known location that is neither in the global assembly cache nor in the directories specified by the and properties. 此类应用程序可使用 属性来避免正常探测导致的延迟，并避免加载可能位于正常探测路径中的必要程序集的副本。Such applications can use the property to avoid the delay caused by normal probing, and to avoid loading copies of the necessary assembly that might be located in the normal probing paths.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisallowBindingRedirects { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.DisallowBindingRedirects : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示应用程序域是否允许程序集绑定重定向。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an application domain allows assembly binding redirection.

value.span: 如果不允许程序集的重定向，则为 ；如果允许，则为 。

span.span: if redirection of assemblies is not allowed; if it is allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设计为由服务和服务器应用程序使用，其中程序集绑定重定向不属于应用程序方案。The property is designed to be used by services and server applications where assembly binding redirection is not part of the application scenario.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisallowCodeDownload { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether HTTP download of assemblies is allowed for an application domain.

value.span: 如果不允许通过 HTTP 下载程序集，则为 ；如果允许则为 。

span.span: if HTTP download of assemblies is not allowed; if it is allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性旨在供服务和服务器应用程序使用，在这些应用程序中从 intranet 或 Internet 下载代码不是应用程序方案的一部分。The property is designed to be used by services and server applications where downloading code from an intranet or the Internet is not part of the application scenario. > [!CAUTION] > 属性的默认值为 `false`。The default value for the property is `false`. 对于服务，此设置是不安全的。This setting is unsafe for services. 若要帮助防止服务下载部分受信任的代码，请将此属性设置为 `true`。To help prevent services from downloading partially trusted code, set this property to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisallowPublisherPolicy { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.DisallowPublisherPolicy : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将配置文件的 [<publisherPolicy>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/publisherpolicy-element.md) 部分应用于应用程序域。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the [<publisherPolicy>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/publisherpolicy-element.md) section of the configuration file is applied to an application domain.

value.span: 如果忽略应用程序域配置文件的 部分，则为 ；如果接受所声明的发行者策略，则为 。

span.span: if the section of the configuration file for an application domain is ignored; if the declared publisher policy is honored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性专门适用于在本地加载的 Web 应用程序。The property specifically applies to a Web application that is loaded locally. 使用此属性可帮助防止恶意尝试在安全模式下执行不安全的 Web 应用程序。Use this property to help prevent a malicious attempt to execute an unsafe Web application in safe mode. 有关跳过发行者策略的详细信息，请参阅[重定向程序集版本](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/redirect-assembly-versions.md)主题。For more information about bypassing publisher policy, see the [Redirecting Assembly Versions](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/redirect-assembly-versions.md) topic. 有关安全模式的详细信息，请参阅[运行时如何定位程序集](~/docs/framework/deployment/how-the-runtime-locates-assemblies.md)主题的 "检查配置文件" 部分。For more information about safe mode, see the "Examining the Configuration Files" section of the [How the Runtime Locates Assemblies](~/docs/framework/deployment/how-the-runtime-locates-assemblies.md) topic.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DynamicBase { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DynamicBase : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置动态生成的文件所在的目录的基目录。

span.span: Gets or sets the base directory where the directory for dynamically generated files is located.

value.span: 所在的目录。

span.span: The directory where the is located.

para.span: 该属性的返回值不同于分配的值。

span.span: The return value of this property is different from the value assigned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可设置新应用程序域的动态目录所在的基目录。Use this property to set the base directory where the dynamic directory for the new application domain will be located. 当新应用程序域中的代码加载程序集时，程序集解析将首先在正常探测路径中查找。When code in the new application domain loads an assembly, assembly resolution looks first in the normal probing paths. 如果它找不到程序集，则会在动态目录中查找 属性返回的动态目录。If it does not find the assembly, it looks in the dynamic directory, which is returned by the property. 新应用程序域将加载并执行的动态程序集可以放置在该处。Dynamic assemblies that will be loaded and executed by the new application domain can be placed there. 将路径分配到 属性时，会添加一个附加的子目录;此子目录的名称是分配给 属性的值的哈希代码。When you assign a path to the property, an additional subdirectory is added; the name of this subdirectory is the hash code of the value assigned to the property. 因此，随后由此属性返回的基目录始终不同于分配的值。Thus, the base directory subsequently returned by this property is always different from the value assigned. > [!IMPORTANT] > 为此属性赋值不会创建任何目录。Assigning a value to this property does not create any directories. 目录必须由使用它们的代码创建或验证。The directories must be created or verified by the code that uses them. 动态目录是 的子目录。The dynamic directory is a subdirectory of . 它的简单名称是 属性返回的值，因此，其格式是\\*哈希代码*\\*应用程序名称*的*原始路径*。Its simple name is the value returned by the property, so its format is *original path*\\*hash code*\\*application name*. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来设置加载动态程序集时应用程序域探测的路径。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to set the path an application domain probes when loading dynamic assemblies. 该示例创建一个 对象，并将其 属性设置为 "Example"，并将其 属性设置为 "C:\DynamicAssemblyDir"。The example creates an object and sets its property to "Example" and its property to "C:\DynamicAssemblyDir". 然后，该示例显示 "" 属性，以显示已将应用程序名称的哈希代码附加为最初分配的路径的子目录。The example then displays the property, to show that the hash code of the application name has been appended as a subdirectory of the path that was originally assigned. > [!NOTE] > 本示例中的基目录应位于示例应用程序的探测路径之外。The base directory in this example is intended to be outside the probing path for the example application. 请确保在其他位置编译该示例。Be sure to compile the example in a different location. 每次运行该示例时，删除基目录及其所有子目录。Delete the base directory and all its subdirectories each time you run the example. 该示例使用 对象创建一个新的应用程序域。The example creates a new application domain using the object. 然后，该示例创建动态目录（如果它尚不存在）。The example then creates the dynamic directory if it does not already exist. 尽管该示例使用应用程序域的 属性来获取动态目录的名称，但它可以通过连接原始路径、应用程序名称的哈希代码和应用程序名称来轻松地轻松创建目录。Although the example uses the application domain's property to get the name of the dynamic directory, it could just as easily create the directory beforehand by concatenating the original path, the hash code of the application name, and the application name. 该示例有一个 `GenerateDynamicAssembly` 方法，该方法发出名为 `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` 的程序集，并将其存储在新应用程序域的动态目录中。The example has a `GenerateDynamicAssembly` method that emits an assembly named `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` and stores it in the new application domain's dynamic directory. 动态程序集包含一个类型 `HelloWorld`，该类型具有一个名为 `HelloFromAD`的静态方法（在 Visual Basic 中为`Shared` 方法）。The dynamic assembly contains one type, `HelloWorld`, that has a static method (`Shared` method in Visual Basic) named `HelloFromAD`. 调用此方法将显示应用程序域的名称。Calling this method displays the name of the application domain. `Example` 类派生自 ，因此该示例可以在新应用程序域中创建类的实例并调用其 `Test` 方法。The `Example` class derives from , so the example can create an instance of the class in the new application domain and call its `Test` method. `Test` 方法按动态程序集的显示名称加载该程序集，并调用静态的 `HelloFromAD` 方法。The `Test` method loads the dynamic assembly by its display name and calls the static `HelloFromAD` method. 通过编写名为 `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` 的程序集的代码并将其编译到与此示例相同的目录中，可以显示在正常探测路径之后搜索动态目录。You can show that the dynamic directory is searched after the normal probing paths by writing code for an assembly named `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` and compiling it in the same directory as this example. 该程序集必须具有一个名为 `HelloWorld` 的类，该类具有名为 `HelloFromAD`的静态方法。The assembly must have a class named `HelloWorld` with a static method named `HelloFromAD`. 此方法不必与示例中的相同。它可以直接在控制台上显示字符串。This method does not have to have the same functionality as the one in the example; it can simply display a string to the console. 该程序集还必须有一个将其版本设置为1.0.0.0 的 特性。The assembly must also have an attribute that sets its version to 1.0.0.0. 运行此示例时，将在搜索动态目录之前找到当前目录中编译的程序集。When you run the example, the assembly you compiled in the current directory is found before the dynamic directory is searched. [!code-cpp[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/CPP/addynamicbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/CS/addynamicbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/VB/addynamicbase.vb#1)]

exception.span: 无法设置此属性，因为应用程序域上的应用程序名称为 。

span.span: This property cannot be set because the application name on the application domain is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] GetConfigurationBytes() cil managed

summary.span: 返回由 方法设置的 XML 配置信息，这些信息优先于应用程序的 XML 配置信息。

span.span: Returns the XML configuration information set by the method, which overrides the application's XML configuration information.

returns.span: 是包含 方法设置的 XML 配置信息的数组，或者，如果尚未调用 方法，则是 。

span.span: An array that contains the XML configuration information that was set by the method, or if the method has not been called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了一种方法来重写创建新应用程序域的应用程序的配置信息。The method provides a way to override the configuration information of an application that creates a new application domain. `value` 中的配置文件信息将重写应用程序的配置文件信息。The configuration file information in `value` overrides the configuration file information for the application. 例如，当 Example 应用程序创建新的应用程序域时，它可以重写最初从 web.config 文件中获取的配置信息。For example, when the Example.exe application creates a new application domain, it can override the configuration information originally obtained from Example.exe.config file. > [!IMPORTANT] > 配置文件信息的某些使用者不使用 方法存储的信息。Some consumers of configuration file information do not use the information stored by the method. 运行时不强制执行此功能。The runtime does not enforce this. 若要确保在新的应用程序域中覆盖所有配置文件信息，请使用 属性指定配置文件。To ensure that all configuration file information is overridden in a new application domain, use the property to specify a configuration file. 方法会影响程序集绑定。The method does affect assembly binding. `value` 中的 XML 与普通配置文件中的 XML 相同，不同之处在于该 xml 作为 数组存储。The XML in `value` is the same as the XML in a normal configuration file, except that it is stored as a array. 若要访问应用程序域的配置字节，请使用 属性获取应用程序域的 对象，然后使用 方法。To access the configuration bytes for an application domain, use the property to get the object for the application domain, then use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ LicenseFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.LicenseFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与此域关联的许可证文件的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location of the license file associated with this domain.

value.span: 许可证文件的位置和名称。

span.span: The location and name of the license file.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property LoaderOptimization LoaderOptimization { LoaderOptimization get(); void set(LoaderOptimization value); };
member this.LoaderOptimization : LoaderOptimization with get, set

summary.span: 指定用于加载可执行文件的优化策略。

span.span: Specifies the optimization policy used to load an executable.

value.span: 与 配合使用的枚举常量。

span.span: An enumerated constant that is used with the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个动态程序集，并将其保存到磁盘，然后使用 属性设置用于将程序集加载到应用程序域的优化策略。The following example creates a dynamic assembly and saves it to disk, and then uses the property to set the optimization policy used to load the assembly into an application domain. [!code-cpp[ADDyno#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDyno/CPP/addyno.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADDyno#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDyno/CS/addyno.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADDyno#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDyno/VB/addyno.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ PartialTrustVisibleAssemblies { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };
member this.PartialTrustVisibleAssemblies : string[] with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置标有 标志的程序集的列表，这些程序集对沙盒应用程序域中运行的部分信任代码可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of assemblies marked with the flag that are made visible to partial-trust code running in a sandboxed application domain.

value.span: 部分程序集名称的数组，其中每个部分名称都由简单程序集名称和公钥组成。

span.span: An array of partial assembly names, where each partial name consists of the simple assembly name and the public key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]开始， （APTCA）特性可通过将其 属性设置为 来进行条件。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the (APTCA) attribute can be made conditional by setting its property to . 标记有 的 APTCA 程序集不能由部分受信任的代码使用，除非主机应用程序允许它。An APTCA assembly that is marked with cannot be used by partially trusted code unless the host application allows it. 沙盒应用程序域的宿主允许应用程序域中的代码通过以下方式使用程序集：具有条件 APTCA 特性的程序集：创建一个包含每个程序集的简单名称和公钥的数组，并将该数组分配给此属性。The host of a sandboxed application domain allows code in the application domain to use assemblies with conditional APTCA attributes by creating an array that contains the simple name and public key of each assembly, and assigning the array to this property. 例如，数组的元素可能如下所示： "MyAssembly，PublicKey =  b8ea2804c40efbc0b6b9"。For example, an element of the array might look like the following: "MyAssembly, ". > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果你使用的是 的子类，并且定义它的程序集依赖于使用条件 APTCA 特性标记的程序集，则你必须将这些程序集包含在传递给你用来创建应用程序域的 的 属性的列表中。If you are using a subclass of , and the assembly that defines it depends on assemblies that are marked with the conditional APTCA attribute, you must include those assemblies in the list that you pass to the property of the you use to create application domains. 否则，将禁用用条件 APTCA 特性标记的程序集。Otherwise the assemblies that are marked with the conditional APTCA attribute will be disabled. > [!NOTE] > 调试在沙盒应用程序域中运行的应用程序时，某些 消息可能会产生误导。When you are debugging an application that is running in a sandboxed application domain, some messages can be misleading. 例如，消息可能表明，一个完全受信任的程序集只有有限的权限，当问题的真正原因在于，超过沙盒应用程序域的授予集的安全要求已传播到沙盒应用程序域的边界，并且失败。For example, a message might state that one of your fully trusted assemblies has only limited permissions, when the real cause of the problem is that a security demand that exceeds the grant set of the sandboxed application domain has propagated to the boundary of the sandboxed application domain and failed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PrivateBinPath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.PrivateBinPath : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序基目录下的目录列表，这些目录被探测以寻找其中的私有程序集。

span.span: Gets or sets the list of directories under the application base directory that are probed for private assemblies.

value.span: 目录名称的列表，用分号分隔。

span.span: A list of directory names separated by semicolons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 私有程序集部署在与应用程序相同的目录结构中。Private assemblies are deployed in the same directory structure as the application. 如果为 指定的目录不在 下，它们将被忽略。If the directories specified for are not under , they are ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PrivateBinPathProbe { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.PrivateBinPathProbe : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串值，该值包括或不包括应用程序的搜索路径中的 ，并只在 中进行搜索。

span.span: Gets or sets a string value that includes or excludes from the search path for the application, and searches only .

value.span: 空引用（ Visual Basic 中的 ），包括搜索程序集时的应用程序基路径；要排除该路径的任何非空字符串值。

span.span: A null reference ( in Visual Basic) to include the application base path when searching for assemblies; any non-null string value to exclude the path.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为任何非 null 字符串值（包括 （""））以排除应用程序目录路径（即从应用程序的搜索路径中 ），并仅在 中搜索程序集。Set this property to any non-null string value, including (""), to exclude the application directory path - that is, - from the search path for the application, and to search for assemblies only in .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SandboxInterop { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.SandboxInterop : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在应用程序域中为互操作调用禁用接口缓存，从而对每个调用执行 QueryInterface。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether interface caching is disabled for interop calls in the application domain, so that a QueryInterface is performed on each call.

value.span: 如果为使用当前 对象创建的应用程序域中的互操作调用禁用接口缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if interface caching is disabled for interop calls in application domains created with the current object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 禁用接口缓存会对互操作调用的性能产生显著影响。Disabling interface caching has a significant impact on the performance of interop calls. 此成员在 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]中引入。This member is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetCompatibilitySwitches(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> switches) cil managed
Public Sub SetCompatibilitySwitches (switches As IEnumerable(Of String))

param.name: switches
param.span: 指定兼容性开关的字符串值的可枚举集或要擦除现有兼容性开关的 。

span.span: An enumerable set of string values that specify compatibility switches, or to erase the existing compatibility switches.

summary.span: 设置指定的开关，从而使应用程序域针对指定问题与早期版本的 .NET Framework 兼容。

span.span: Sets the specified switches, making the application domain compatible with previous versions of the .NET Framework for the specified issues.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 的主要版本有时会引入以前版本的重大更改。Major versions of the .NET Framework sometimes introduce breaking changes from the previous version. 例如，[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]中引入了少量的重大更改。For example, the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] introduces a small number of breaking changes from the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. 使用 方法指定应为应用程序域回滚一个或多个此类重大更改，以使该行为与以前版本的 .NET Framework 兼容。Use the method to specify that one or more of these breaking changes should be rolled back for the application domain, to make the behavior compatible with the previous version of the .NET Framework. 每次调用此方法时，它将替换现有的开关设置。Each time you call this method, it replaces the existing switch settings. 若要清除设置，请指定 `switches` 参数 `null`。To erase the settings, specify `null` for the `switches` parameter. 为 `switches` 提供的字符串值集可以是一个简单的字符串数组，因为数组实现 接口。The set of string values you provide for `switches` can be a simple string array, because arrays implement the interface. 下表提供了可设置为还原 .NET Framework 早期版本的行为的兼容性开关的示例。The following table provides examples of compatibility switches that can be set to restore the behavior of earlier versions of the .NET Framework. |开关Switch|含义Meaning| |------------|-------------| |"NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy""NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy"|在此应用程序域中启用了 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] 的代码访问安全性（CAS）。Code access security (CAS) for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] is enabled in this application domain. 请参阅[<NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy> 元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md)。See [<NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md).| |"NetFx40_Legacy20SortingBehavior""NetFx40_Legacy20SortingBehavior"|在此应用程序域中启用了 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] 的字符串排序默认值。String sorting defaults for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] are enabled in this application domain. 成功还原旧的排序行为还要求 sort00001000.dll 动态链接库在本地系统上可用。Successfully restoring legacy sorting behavior also requires the sort00001000.dll dynamic link library to be available on the local system. 请参阅[<CompatSortNLSVersion> 元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/compatsortnlsversion-element.md)。See [<CompatSortNLSVersion> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/compatsortnlsversion-element.md).| |"NetFx40_Legacy40SortingBehavior""NetFx40_Legacy40SortingBehavior"|此应用程序域中启用了 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 和 Unicode 5.0 的字符串排序默认值。String sorting defaults for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] and Unicode 5.0 are enabled in this application domain. 成功还原旧的排序行为还要求 sort00060101 动态链接库在本地系统上可用。Successfully restoring legacy sorting behavior also requires the sort00060101.dll dynamic link library to be available on the local system.| |"NetFx40_TimeSpanLegacyFormatMode""NetFx40_TimeSpanLegacyFormatMode"|在此应用程序域中启用了 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] 格式设置行为。 formatting behavior for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] is enabled in this application domain. 请参阅 主题[<TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode> 元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md)和 "还原旧的 TimeSpan 格式" 部分。See [<TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md) and the "Restoring Legacy TimeSpan Formatting" section of the topic.| |"UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm""UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm"|运行时基于每个应用程序域计算字符串的哈希代码，而不是使用单个哈希算法跨应用程序域生成一致的哈希代码。The runtime calculates hash codes for strings on a per application domain basis instead of using a single hashing algorithm that produces a consistent hash code across application domains. 请参阅[<UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm> 元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/userandomizedstringhashalgorithm-element.md)。See [<UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/userandomizedstringhashalgorithm-element.md).|

span.span: <NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy> Element
<CompatSortNLSVersion> Element
<TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode> Element
<UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm> Element

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetConfigurationBytes(unsigned int8[] value) cil managed

param.name: value
param.span: 一个数组，其中包含要用于应用程序域的 XML 配置信息。

span.span: An array that contains the XML configuration information to be used for the application domain.

summary.span: 提供应用程序域的 XML 配置信息，并替换应用程序的 XML 配置信息。

span.span: Provides XML configuration information for the application domain, replacing the application's XML configuration information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了一种方法来替换创建新应用程序域的应用程序的配置信息。The method provides a way to replace the configuration information of an application that creates a new application domain. `value` 中的配置文件信息将替换应用程序的配置文件信息。The configuration file information in `value` replaces the configuration file information for the application. 例如，当 Example 应用程序创建新的应用程序域时，它可以替换最初从 web.config 文件中获取的配置信息。For example, when the Example.exe application creates a new application domain, it can replace the configuration information originally obtained from the Example.exe.config file. > [!IMPORTANT] > 配置文件信息的某些使用者不使用 方法存储的信息。Some consumers of configuration file information do not use the information stored by the method. 运行时不强制执行此功能。The runtime does not enforce this. 若要确保在新的应用程序域中替换所有配置文件信息，请使用 属性指定配置文件。To ensure that all configuration file information is replaced in a new application domain, use the property to specify a configuration file. 方法会影响程序集绑定。The method does affect assembly binding. `value` 中的 XML 与普通配置文件中的 XML 相同，不同之处在于该 xml 作为 数组存储。The XML in `value` is the same as the XML in a normal configuration file, except that it is stored as a array.

span.span: Runtime Settings Schema

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetNativeFunction (string functionName, int functionVersion, IntPtr functionPointer);

param.span: [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，必须为 1 或者 更大的数值。

span.span: For [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], its value must be 1 or greater.
A pointer to the function that overrides .

summary.span: 向通用语言运行时提供备用字符串比较功能实现。

span.span: Provides the common language runtime with an alternate implementation of a string comparison function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下字符串比较和排序方法可由 方法重写：The following string comparison and sorting methods can be overridden by the method: - `IsNLSDefinedString` - `CompareStringEx` - `LCMapStringEx` - `FindNLSStringEx` - `CompareStringOrdinal` - `GetNLSVersion` 有关这些函数的信息，请参阅[国家/地区语言支持功能](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=228134)。For information about these functions, see [National Language Support Functions](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=228134).

span.span: is .

exception.span: 不是 1 或者更大的值。

span.span: is not 1 or greater.
-or-
is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ShadowCopyDirectories { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ShadowCopyDirectories : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置目录的名称，这些目录包含要影像复制的程序集。

span.span: Gets or sets the names of the directories containing assemblies to be shadow copied.

value.span: 目录名称的列表，用分号分隔。

span.span: A list of directory names separated by semicolons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用卷影复制时，默认情况下是通过探测找到的所有程序集的卷影副本。也就是说，在由 和 属性指定的目录中。When shadow copying is enabled, the default is to shadow copy all assemblies found through probing; that is, in the directories specified by the and properties. 属性将卷影副本限制为 指定的目录中的程序集。The property restricts the shadow copy to the assemblies in the directories specified by . 如果不向 属性分配字符串，或者如果将此属性设置为 `null`，则 和 属性指定的目录中的所有程序集都将进行卷影复制。If you don't assign a string to the property, or if you set this property to `null`, all assemblies in the directories specified by the and properties are shadow copied. > [!IMPORTANT] > 目录路径不能包含分号，因为分号是分隔符。Directory paths must not contain semicolons, because the semicolon is the delimiter character. 分号没有转义符。There is no escape character for semicolons. 如果卷影复制生效，则在加载程序集之前，程序集文件将复制到另一个位置。When shadow copying is in effect, assembly files are copied to another location before the assemblies are loaded. 原始程序集文件未锁定，因此可进行更新。The original assembly file is not locked, so it can be updated. 有关卷影复制的详细信息，请参阅[卷影复制程序集](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。For more information on shadow copying, see [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md).

span.span: Shadow Copying Assemblies

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ShadowCopyFiles { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ShadowCopyFiles : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指示卷影复制是打开还是关闭的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that indicates whether shadow copying is turned on or off.

value.span: 字符串值“true”指示打开了卷影复制；“false”则指示关闭了卷影复制。

span.span: The string value "true" to indicate that shadow copying is turned on; or "false" to indicate that shadow copying is turned off.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关卷影复制的详细信息，请参阅[卷影复制程序集](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。For more information on shadow copying, see [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md).

span.span: Shadow Copying Assemblies

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TargetFrameworkName As String
public: property System::String ^ TargetFrameworkName { System::String ^ get(); };
public: property System::String ^ TargetFrameworkName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TargetFrameworkName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为应用程序域指定目标版本和 .NET Framework 配置文件的字符串，以可由 构造函数分析的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies the target version and profile of the .NET Framework for the application domain, in a format that can be parsed by the constructor.

value.span: .NET Framework 的目标版本与配置文件。

span.span: The target version and profile of the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性，告知当前正在运行的 .NET Framework 应用程序域将用于加载和运行已针对目标版本和配置文件编译的程序集的。Set this property to tell the currently running version of the .NET Framework that the application domain will be used to load and run assemblies that have been compiled for the target version and profile. 如果当前运行的 .NET Framework 版本具有可影响使用目标版本编译的代码兼容性的可选行为，则它可以根据需要启用或禁用这些行为以提高兼容性。If the currently running version of the .NET Framework has optional behaviors that affect the compatibility of code that was compiled with the target version, it can enable or disable those behaviors, as appropriate, to improve compatibility. 当应用程序通过在单独的应用程序域中运行使用 .NET Framework 的多个版本编译的外接程序时，这会很有用。This can be useful when an application supports add-ins compiled with multiple versions of the .NET Framework by running them in separate application domains. 对于客户端应用程序， 属性的值将从 属性推断出来。For client applications, the value of the property is inferred from the attribute. 在 [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] 和更高版本中，将根据项目的 "**目标框架**" 属性的设置，自动将此特性添加到程序集中。In [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] and later, this attribute is added to the assembly automatically based on the setting of the project's **Target Framework** property.
